title: Did Geoffrey Epstein, Bill Barr's father, write a fascinating account of the story of a magician?
subtitle: The Mema means that there is a notorious link between the financier and the convicted of a sexual offence, Jeffrey Epstein and Donald Bar, the father of the U.S. Attorney-General Bill Bar.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Donald Barr, father of US Attorney Bill Bar, hired Geoffrey Epstein as a teacher, served as his teacher, and wrote a novel about men raping teenage girls.
